languages.text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк был подвергнут испытанию веры и спустя планетарный оборот испустил дух, доказав, что являлся обычным обманщиком. Среди черни это вызвало гнев и смуту.{/n}
{n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next planetary turn, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк был подвергнут испытанию веры и спустя планетарный оборот испустил дух, доказав, что являлся обычным обманщиком. Среди черни это вызвало гнев и смуту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next day, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El profeta de voz pura fue sometido a la prueba de la fe y murió durante la siguiente rotación planetaria, demostrando que era un vulgar farsante. Esto ha sembrado furia y descontento entre el populacho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next planetary turn, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El profeta de voz pura fue sometido a la prueba de la fe y murió durante la siguiente rotación planetaria, demostrando que era un vulgar farsante. Esto ha sembrado furia y descontento entre el populacho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure a été soumis à l'épreuve de pureté, à laquelle il a succombé dès le tour planétaire suivant, prouvant ainsi sa tromperie. Cette révélation n'a pas manqué de susciter la colère de la populace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next planetary turn, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure a été soumis à l'épreuve de pureté, à laquelle il a succombé dès le tour planétaire suivant, prouvant ainsi sa tromperie. Cette révélation n'a pas manqué de susciter la colère de la populace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}纯洁之声先知接受了信仰试炼，但却在下个行星巡中丧了命。这证明了他不过是个招摇撞骗的冒牌货，这激起了民众的义愤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next planetary turn, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纯洁之声先知接受了信仰试炼，但却在下个行星巡中丧了命。这证明了他不过是个招摇撞骗的冒牌货，这激起了民众的义愤。{/n}

languages.text: {n}純声の預言者は信仰の試練にさらされ、次の惑星周期で生命を落とし、彼がただの欺瞞を振りまくものであったことを証明した。このことが民衆の怒りと混乱を煽った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next planetary turn, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}純声の預言者は信仰の試練にさらされ、次の惑星周期で生命を落とし、彼がただの欺瞞を振りまくものであったことを証明した。このことが民衆の怒りと混乱を煽った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme wurde der Prüfung des Glaubens unterzogen und starb — der Beweis, dass er nur ein Lügner gewesen war. Das führte unter dem Pöbel zu Wut und Aufruhr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next planetary turn, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Peygamber Durusöz, bir inanç imtihanına tabi tutuldu. Gezegenin bir sonraki dönüşünde can vererek bir yalancıdan başka bir şey olmadığını kanıtladı. Bu hadise, ayaktakımının öfkesini ve huzursuzluğunu körükledi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was subjected to the trial of faith and perished the next planetary turn, proving that he was nothing but a liar. This stoked anger and turmoil among the rabble.{/n}
